duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead strategy development, evaluation, and implementation of fiscal sponsorship program and strategic consulting and capacity building initiatives.
Oversee the execution of the cross-functional partner experience and service delivery in partnership with the Leadership Team.
Supervise and support leadership development of the MIIC team.
Focus on strategic transformation to support BIPOC groups and donors in the equitable intermediary space.
Facilitate and support business development model and partner acquisition processes.
Lead multi-year strategy setting and impact metrics for fiscal sponsorship program to improve service commitments and partner experience.
Support partner relationship building, advisory structures, and feedback loops to support strategic and operational decisions.
Facilitate communication and collaborative practice, and support the growth of the MIIC Team members.
Cultivate relationships with highly complex partners and develop a pipeline of new business opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in related field (Master's preferred)
